briefTitle: Clinical Study of TA-650 in Patients With Behcet's Disease (BD) With Special Lesions
officialTitle: To Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Pharmacokinetics of TA-650 in Patients With Behcet's Disease ( BD ) With Special Lesions After the Administration of TA-650
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and pharmacokinetics of TA-650 in patients with Behcet's disease ( BD ) with special lesions after the administration of TA-650 at a dosage of 5 mg/kg in weeks 0, 2, and 6, then every 8 weeks after week 14 up to week 46.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Complete Response at Week 30
